title: As an EBIS User I would like to be able to see/modify player profiles even if BAMStats is down
custom_steps:
As an EBIS User I would like to be able to see/modify player profiles even if BAMStats is down

Acceptance Criteria
If we get anything other than a 3xx response code from BAMSTATS, still allow the EBIS player profiles to function.

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to Deny a Pending Employee Permission Request that has been sent to me
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Inquiry club user Submits an Employee Permission Request
AND Receiving Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN Receiving club user views the Pending Employee Permission Request
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Deny button
AND Clicking the Deny button will prompt the user to confirm the action
AND If the User confirms, the form will refresh in view mode
AND The Request's status will be updated to "Denied"
AND The system will generate a clipboard notification to the Inquiring Club Contact notifying them the Request has been denied
BUT  If the User denies, the modal will be dismissed and they will be returned to the form

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_receiving_org_-_pending

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Receiving+Club

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to Approve a Pending Employee Permission Request that has been sent to me
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Inquiry club user Submits an Employee Permission Request
AND Receiving Club user logs in
custom_steps: WHEN Receiving club user views the Pending Employee Permission Request
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Approve button
AND Clicking the Approve button will prompt the user to confirm the action
AND If the User confirms, the form will refresh in view mode
AND The Request's status will be updated to "Active"
AND The system will generate a clipboard notification to the Inquiring Club Contact notifying them the Request has been approved
BUT If the User denies, the modal will be dismissed and they will be returned to the form

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_receiving_org_-_pending

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Receiving+Club

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to enter a resolution on an Active Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Inquiring Club logs in 
AND an Active Employee Permission Request exist
custom_steps: WHEN clicking an Active request from the Employee Permission Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will open the Request in View mode
AND There will be an Edit button which, when clicked, will load the form into edit mode
AND When the form loads the only editable field will be "Resolution" and the Inquiring Club Comments
AND If the user selects 'Extension Requested" from the Resolution dropdown, the following fields will become visible to be edited:
  -- Start Day
  -- Start Time
  -- End Day
  -- End Time
  -- Time Zone
AND There will be a Save button that allows the User to save the entered resolution
AND If 'Extension Requested' is selected as the resolution, the Save button will turn into a 'Submit Extension'

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_approved

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=143365890

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to Submit an Extension Request on an Active Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a CLUB
AND has made made a Permission Request Inquiry  

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_approved
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_receiving_org_-_extension_pending

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=143365890
custom_steps: WHEN "Extension Requested' is selected as the resolution on an Active Employee Permission Request,
custom_expected:
THEN the Save button will turn into a 'Submit Extension' button
AND clicking this button will update the Requests status to "Pending (Ext)"
AND the system will generate a clipboard notification to the Receiving Club Contact notifying them an extension has been requested
AND the Receiving Club will see the new status reflected on their Permission Request Widget
AND the request will be reloaded into view mode for the Inquiring club and they will not have an Edit button

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to Deny an Extension Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND has received an extension request

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_receiving_org_-_extension_pending
custom_steps: WHEN the Receiving Club opens a Request in "Pending (Ext)" state
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Deny button
AND clicking the Deny button will prompt the user to confirm the action
AND if the User confirms, the form will refresh in view mode
AND if the Extension is denied prior to the original expiration date, the status will be updated to "Active (Ext Denied)"
AND if the Extension is denied after the original expiration date, the status will be updated to "Expired"
AND the system will generate a clipboard notification to the Inquiring Club Contact notifying them the extension request has been denied
AND if the User denies, the modal will be dismissed and they will be returned to the form
AND there will be no required field check when Deny is clicked

title: As a Receiving Club User, I want to grant an Extension Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND receiving an extension request

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_receiving_org_-_extension_pending
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_extension_approved
custom_steps: WHEN the Receiving Club opens a Request in "Pending (Ext)" state
custom_expected:
THEN it will open in Edit mode
AND the only fields that will be editable are the Confirm checkbox in the Resolution section and the Receiving Club's Comment box
AND there will be an inactive "Approve Extension" button when the form loads
AND when the Confirm checkbox is clicked, the "Approve Extension" button will become active
AND clicking the Approve Extension button will prompt the user to confirm the action
AND if the User confirms, the form will refresh in view mode
AND the Request's status will be updated to "Active (Ext)"
AND the system will generate a clipboard notification to the Inquiring Club Contact notifying them the extension request has been approved
AND if the User denies, the modal will be dismissed and they will be returned to the form

title: As an Inquiring Club User, I want to enter a Post Extension Resolution on an Active Employee Permission Request
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND is an inquiring club on an approved request

Wires:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_extension_approved

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=143365890
custom_steps: WHEN clicking an Active (Ext) request from the Employee Permission Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN the request will open in view mode
AND there will be an Edit button which, when clicked, will load the form into edit mode
AND when the form loads the only editable field will be "Post Extension Resolution" and the Inquiring Club Comments
AND there will be a Save button that allows the User to save the entered resolution

title: As a User, I want there to be a 7 Day Limit on Negotiating Windows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club
AND is inquiring in another Clubs employee

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+Employee+Permission+Request+Form+-+Inquiring+Club

Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_preliminary
custom_steps: WHEN entering Proposed Dates and Times on a Request
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a 7 day maximum on the negotiating window
AND on Submit, there will be a rule to check to confirm the Negotiating Window is NOT more than 7 days
AND if the check fails, an error will fire notifying the user why they are unable to submit

title: As a User, I want there to be a 7 Day Limit on Negotiating Extension Windows
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a Club


Wire:
https://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=request_form_-_inquiring_org_-_approved

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=143365890
custom_steps: WHEN the Inquiring Club is entering Proposed Dates and Times on a Request Extension
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a 7 day maximum on the negotiating window
AND on Submit, there will be a rule to check to confirm the Negotiating Window is not more than 7 days
AND if the check fails, an error will fire notifying the user why they are unable to submit

title: As a Club User, I want to receive an email when the status of one of my Club's Travel Authorization Forms is Updated
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club user logs into AMT
AND a Travel Authorization is submitted
custom_steps: WHEN the submitted Travel Authorization Form has its status updated to Approved OR Rejected
custom_expected:
THEN the system will send an email to users of the Club that submitted the Form
 - Text of email:
**Subject:** Travel Form Update
**Content:** There has been an update to the travel form submitted on [date submitted] for prospect [Last, First]. Please log into AMT to review.

Related to:
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161764860
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/161764887

title: As a Developer, I want Anthony's queries turned into reports he can access himself
